front.title: IEEE Approved Draft Standard for Power Line Carrier Transmitter/Receiver Equipment used to Transfer Discrete Teleprotection Signals

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This standard describes requirements for power line carrier (PLC) transmitter/receiver equipment used to transfer discrete teleprotection signals at power line carrier frequencies (30-500 kHz). Test requirements and conditions for determining performance, as well as manufacturing requirements, are defined.
